notification.content:
Recruit Edgar and Sabin! A Fateful Coin Toss challenge event launched at 5:00 PM 7/29 PST (1:00 AM 7/30 UTC).

Duration 5:00 PM 7/29 PST (1:00 AM 7/30 UTC) to 4:59 PM 8/8 PST (12:59 AM 8/9 UTC)

Rewards Recruit the royal Figaro twins Edgar and Sabin.

The dungeons are split into one story for each brother, starting with Edgar’s story. After completing Edgar’s story and recruiting Edgar, you can go on to Sabin’s story and recruit him.

Continue through the dungeons to get their Memory Crystals.
Use Edgar and Sabin’s Memory Crystals to break their level caps!

See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: New Event Underway

notification.content:
Bonus Battles in A Planted SeeD! Bonus Battles have been added to the ongoing A Planted SeeD event!

Unlock Bonus Battles by completing all of the event Elite Dungeons.
Survive the gauntlet of boss battles to get the new Armor Breakdown ability!

And another battle awaits after the Bonus Battles!
Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?


See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: Bonus Battles Added

notification.content:
"Blessing of the Mystic Mountain" Login Bonus!

The mines of the mystic mountain overflow with Mythril! To show our gratitude for everyone's efforts in restoring the records, we'll be giving a special Daily Login Bonus!

Receive 1 Mythril every day!
Available from 5:00 PM 7/13 PST (1:00 AM 7/14 UTC) until 4:59 PM 8/12 PST (12:59 AM 8/13 UTC)

Just log in each day to claim the Mythril!
notification.title: Blessing of the Mystic Mountain

notification.content:
5★ Partizan (VI), 5★ Kaiser Knuckles (VI), and 5★ Golden Shield added to Relic Draw.
All three have a drop rate bonus through 4:59 PM 8/8 PST (12:59 AM 8/9 UTC)!

Partizan (VI)
Type: Spear
Soul Break: Bioblaster (Edgar)
Effect: Deal physical poison damage to all targets and sometimes Poison them.

Kaiser Knuckles (VI)
Type: Fist
Soul Break: Rising Phoenix (Sabin)
Effect: Deal physical fire damage to all targets.

Use the Relic Synergies from FFVI equipment to conquer the ongoing A Fateful Coin Toss event!

Use Bioblaster and Rising Phoenix to devastate powerful enemies!

FINAL FANTASY VI Equipment Added! Golden Shield (VI)
Type: Shield

5★ FINAL FANTASY VI Equipment Drop Rate Bonus!Drop rate bonus for Golden Shield (VI), Hawkeye (VI), Thunder Blade (VI), Mystery Veil (VI), and Golden Spear (VI)!

Use the Relic Synergies from FF VI equipment to fight your way through the ongoing A Fateful Coin Toss event!
notification.title: New Relic Draw Drops

notification.content:
New Dungeons Added! New dungeons are available as of 5:00 PM 7/26 PST (1:00 AM 7/27 UTC)!
Relive epic stories and battles of the past in new classic and elite dungeons!

New Dungeons! Experience new adventures from the realms of FF I, FF IV, and FF X.
Venture forth with Kimahri and the Ninja!

New Record Materia! This update includes two new Record Materia:
-Cecil (Paladin): Holy Blade
Gain HP when attacking!
-Summoner: Summoning Spring II
Restore one summoning use at the start of battle!
Select Party -> Party Members -> Record Materia to see how to unlock them!

Get Sephiroth in Bonus Quests! Bonus Quest added!
- Complete Midgar Highway Elite (VII)
After accepting the Bonus Quest, complete the necessary dungeons to recruit Sephiroth.

Bi-Monthly Updates! New dungeons and adventures will be released about twice per month.
The next release is scheduled to coincide with the next event in mid-August!


We hope you continue to enjoy playing FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!
notification.title: New Quests & Dungeons!

notification.content:
5★Sleipnir's Tail (VIII), 5★Morning Star (VIII), and 5★Raijin's Vest (VIII) added to Relic Draw.
5★Sleipnir's Tail (VIII) and 5★Morning Star (VIII) have a drop rate bonus through 4:59 PM 7/31 PST (12:59 AM 8/1 UTC)!

Sleipnir's Tail (VIII)
Type: Whip
Soul Break: Maser Eye (Quistis)
Effect: Deal non-elemental magic damage to all targets.

Morning Star (VIII)
Type: Rod
Soul Break: Trabia's Light (Selphie)
Effect: Restore a moderate amount of HP to all allies.

The Relic Synergy from FINAL FANTASY VIII equipment will also give your party a leg up during the ongoing A Planted Seed event!
Use the Soul Breaks Maser Eye and Trabia's Light to make it through the SeeD field exam!

FINAL FANTASY VIII Shared Soul Break equipment also added to Relic Draw! 5★Raijin's Vest (VIII) has a Shared Soul Break!

Raijin's Vest (VIII)
Type: Light Armor
Soul Break: Lightning Slash
Effect: Deal physical lightning damage to all targets.

5★ FINAL FANTASY VIII Equipment Drop Rate Bonus!Drop rate bonus for Minotaur Plate (VIII), Fujin's Chakram (VIII), Balamb Garden Uniform (VIII), and Blitz Sword (VIII)!

Use the Relic Synergies from FF VIII equipment to fight your way through the ongoing A Planted Seed event!
notification.title: New Relic Draw Drops

notification.content:
Summer Mythril Giveaway

Summer is well underway, and we're feeling extra generous!

We're giving a one-off bonus of 5 Mythril!
Just log in between 7/24 5:00 PM PST (7/25 1:00 AM UTC) and 7/31 4:59 PM PST (8/1 12:59 AM UTC)!

5 Mythril will be sent directly to your Item Chest, so keep an eye out for it!
notification.title: Summer Mythril Giveaway

notification.content:
Restore Quistis and Selphie’s Hero Records! A Planted Seed event launched at 5:00 PM 7/21 PST (1:00 AM 7/22 UTC)!

Duration 5:00 PM 7/21 PST (1:00 AM 7/22 UTC) to 4:59 PM 7/31 PST (12:59 AM 8/1 UTC)

Rewards Recruit Seed members Quistis and Selphie!
Complete the Elite Dungeons to get Quistis and Selphie Memory Crystals.
Use their Memory Crystals to break the level cap!

See Event Rules for more details.

Quest Added A new quest has been added alongside the event launch:
-Hone Revive (Physical Ability)

Complete the quest to claim the reward!
notification.title: New Event and Quests Added

notification.content:
This is an important notice for players of SQUARE ENIX games on the iOS platform.

Apple has officially announced the release of its iOS 9 Beta. Please note that if you install the iOS 9 Beta on your device, SQUARE ENIX apps may encounter malfunctions such as performance errors or loss of data, or perhaps even fail to deliver in-game currency purchased with real money.

Since our apps are not compatible with the iOS 9 Beta at this time, we regret we are unable to provide customer support for any trouble arising from installation of this OS (including, but not limited to, data recovery or undelivered in-game currencies). Please be aware that SQUARE ENIX will not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, in any way for loss or damages of any kind incurred by installing or using the iOS 9 Beta with relation to SQUARE ENIX apps.

For further information, please also see Apple's "Frequently Asked Questions."
https://beta.apple.com/sp/en/betaprogram/faq
notification.title: Apple iOS 9 Beta Notice
